Lightweight and Durable: Develop a pole made of advanced composites, such as carbon fiber or Kevlar, that is both lightweight and incredibly durable, reducing fatigue and increasing pole lifespan.
Versatile Adjustability: Create a pole with interchangeable tips and grips, allowing users to adjust the pole for different snow conditions, terrain, or personal preferences.
Built-in Navigation: Incorporate a small compass or GPS module into the pole, providing skiers with real-time navigation and route tracking.
Safety Features: Design a pole with an integrated avalanche probe or shovel, allowing skiers to quickly and easily search for buried victims in case of an avalanche.
Power-Assist: Develop a pole with a built-in motor or harness, providing an electric boost to help skiers climb steep hills or traverse challenging terrain.
